CRUMPET Classes¶

This is where all the documentation will go.

Crumpet([fname, path, vmax, nmax, verbose, …])

CRUMPET container object for collsional-radiative models

Crm(species, bg, reactionlist, verbose, NP)

Class containing the CRM setup and central routines

RateData([amjuel, hydhel, h2vibr, ADAS, UE, …])

Class containing data stored in the default databases

Reaction(database, coeffs, typ, data, bg, …)

Class containing reaction data

Tools()

Object with funcitons commonly used by several CRUMPET objects
